name: Chieftain Blade
description: A crude but effective blade taken from a goblin chieftain.

name: Goblin Chieftain Helm
description: A helm fashioned from bone and metal, worn by goblin leaders.

name: Warren Key
description: A key that unlocks passages in the Gloomfang Warren.

name: Minor Healing Potion
description: A small vial of healing liquid.

name: Captain Sword
description: A well-maintained blade used by goblin captains.

name: Guard Plate
description: Reinforced plate armor from the guard post.

name: Deep Passage Key
description: A key that grants access to the deeper passages.

name: Healing Potion
description: A vial of healing liquid.

name: Dark Shaman Staff
description: A staff imbued with dark magic, pulsing with shadow energy.

name: Shadow Robe
description: A robe that seems to drink the light around it.

name: Dark Essence Crystal
description: A crystal of pure dark essence, valuable to dark mages.

name: Greater Healing Potion
description: A powerful healing potion that restores significant health.

name: Overlord Axe
description: A massive axe wielded by the Gloomfang Overlord. Its edge never dulls.

name: Overlord Crown
description: A crown of dark metal, symbol of absolute authority.

name: Overlord Armor
description: Masterfully crafted armor fit for a goblin overlord.

name: Ancient Key
description: An ancient key of unknown origin. It hums with old magic.

name: Rare Gem
description: A rare gem of exceptional quality, worth a fortune.

name: Goblin Ear
description: A goblin ear, proof of a kill. Some quests require these.

name: Raider Blade
description: A blade favored by goblin raiders.

name: Leather Scraps
description: Scraps of leather, useful for basic crafting.

name: Shaman Staff
description: A simple staff used by goblin shamans.

name: Warrior Sword
description: A reliable sword used by goblin warriors.

name: Elite Blade
description: A superior blade carried by elite goblin fighters.

name: Reinforced Leather
description: Tough leather reinforced with metal studs.

name: Guard Spear
description: A long spear used by goblin guards.

name: Chainmail Piece
description: A piece of chainmail armor, can be repaired or reforged.

name: Berserker Axe
description: A brutal axe favored by goblin berserkers.

name: Bloodstained Cloth
description: Cloth stained with the blood of many battles.

name: Shadow Staff
description: A staff that channels shadow magic.

name: Dark Essence
description: Essence tainted by dark magic.

name: Guardian Mace
description: A heavy mace wielded by dark guardians.

name: Dark Plate
description: Plate armor forged in darkness, offering excellent protection.

name: Bat Wing
description: A leathery wing from a cave bat.

name: Bat Fang
description: A sharp fang from a cave bat.

name: Drake Scale
description: A tough scale from a cave drake, valuable for crafting.

name: Drake Fang
description: A massive fang from a cave drake.

name: Drake Essence
description: Pure essence extracted from a drake, pulsing with power.
